statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 9 \\ 3 \\ -6 \\ -16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
